content: right side row 1 ws knit slip1 slip the next stitch purl-wise row 2 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts st s stitch es row 3 to 10 knit st st stockinette row 11 k2 k2tog 7 times k2 11 sts tyb take the yarn to the back break the cream working yarn and join brown ws wrong side row 12 to 16 starting on a rs knit row work 5 row in st st knitting pattern row 17 p2tog 5 times p1 6 sts body pull through to cast off make 1 cast on 20 sts in cream on 3mm needles start at the bottom edge in garter stitch legs row 1 ws knit make 4 cast on 8 sts in cream on 3mm needles row 2 rs k1 kfb k6 kfb k1 2 times 24 sts start at the top of the leg row 3 knit row 1 to 4 knit row 4 k2 kfb k6 kfb k2 2 times 28 sts break the cream working yarn and join brown row 5 knit row 5 to 16 starting on a rs knit row work 12 row 6 k3 kfb k6 kfb k3 2 times 32 sts row in st st row 7 to 15 knit row 17 and 18 knit row 16 k3 k2tog k22 k2tog k3 30 sts pull through to cast off row 17 knit row 18 k2 k2tog k22 k2tog k2 28 sts ears row 19 cast off the first 9 sts knit to the last 9 sts make 2 using the cable cast on method cast on 4 cast off the last 9 sts and break the working yarn sts in cream on 3mm needles then cast off to 10 sts make a small strip of knitting andy the llama copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 2 of 3 tail body fold the piece in half and sew together the make 1 using the cable cast on method cast on 7 cast on edge along the bottom of the body the sts in cream on 3mm needles then cast off to side edges at the back of the body and the cast off make a small strip of knitting edges along the top of the body add stuffing then sew the side edges of the neck together adding stuffing as you go but leave the cast off edge blanket opening at the top of neck open make 1 cast on 9 sts in blue on 3mm needles head sew the side edges together adding ⇨ note the blanket uses a slip_stitch pattern stuffing as you sew and gather the cast on stitches byf slip1 tyb for byf bring the working yarn together at the back of the head the seam runs from the back of the work to the front of the work down the centre underside of the head embroider between the two needles then slip1 by slipping the eyes and nose in black embroidery thread over the next stitch on
